ideas.title: JIT Compilation for TuskTsk
ideas.description: Implement just-in-time compilation for dynamic TuskTsk expressions

ideas.title: Parallel Parsing Engine
ideas.description: Implement multi-threaded parsing for large configuration files

ideas.title: Advanced Memory Pooling
ideas.description: Implement object pooling for AST nodes to reduce GC pressure

ideas.title: Predictive AST Caching
ideas.description: Use ML to predict which AST nodes will be accessed next

ideas.title: GPU Acceleration for Parsing
ideas.description: Implement GPU-accelerated parsing for massive configuration files

future_considerations: Integration with A7 for performance-aware CLI operations
Coordination with A8 for database performance optimization
Performance benchmarking against other configuration languages
Performance optimization recommendations based on usage patterns
implementation_insights: SIMD operations provide significant performance improvements for text processing
Memory-mapped files are essential for handling multi-gigabyte configurations
AST caching must be intelligent to avoid memory bloat
Binary compilation requires careful versioning and backward compatibility
Performance monitoring must be lightweight to avoid overhead
